resources.string: Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Eyes open dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
When you close your eyes, You will hear beeps
OpenEyes is a Application that alerts drowsiness when driving or studying. Etc.
1- Face detector works only in portrait mode. \n2- To use the app in background, just close the app from launch screen. \n3- To completely close the app just click on notification button.

This feature depends on the light around you
Flashlight can\'t be used with back camera
